title: get ready for bloodmoon
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GQfGqr_Zt2A

here are the champs you can play in this mode

•Ahri
•Akali
•Camille
•Diana
•Ekko
•Elise
•Evelynn
•Fizz
•Kassadin
•Katarina
•Kennen
•Kha’Zix
•Leblanc
•Lee Sin
•Pantheon
•Rengar
•Shaco
•Talon
•Yasuo
•Zed

plan and speculate. 

Also I feel like this is secretly how riot plans to finish the assassin rework lol

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/The_Blood_Moon

here's the lore

and here's a TL;DR of the lore

There was once a great warrior named Reina or something who was being stalked by this spirit and the spirit who wore a scary demon's mask and was like " le rawr I'm scary" and so Reina ran and ran from her stalker but to no avail, he always found her. Sick of this she made her own scary mask and put it on. And when the scary demon guy popped out of the bushes again he said "le rawr" and she be like "Le rawr, I'm even scarier!" and he got scared and ran away. 

Apparently the bloodmoon festival is about facing fears and things that bother you a lot.

replies.body: Who cares, it'll just be Kha'Zix/Rengar/Katarina/Camille/Ekko/Yasuo/Zed/Lee Sin/Fizz/Diana played. everyone else on that list can get out.

> [{quoted}](name=A Vel Koz Main,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AJsrHpI6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-29T02:34:47.657+0000)
>
> Who cares, it'll just be Kha'Zix/Rengar/Katarina/Camille/Ekko/Yasuo/Zed/Lee Sin/Fizz/Diana played. everyone else on that list can get out.

i'm there for the ahri :3

I wonder if you can get support items cuz all of those champs are kindof screwed if you can xD
from what i saw on the livestream, they only had high damage items available, anything that mitigated damage was out except zhonias and edge of night
